jobDescription: We are working with a global enterprise software company that is rapidly expanding in the US.  The company is currently on-boarding some major customers and needs an additional Data Analyst/Engineer analyze and produce detailed requirements for data extraction/mapping from a range of cloud and installed finance packages.  They have cutting edge SaaS products that work with the customers own systems and provide clean, real time information and analytics.  Required for this role  2-3+ years of industry data/engineering experience.  SQL and Knowledge of database structures.  Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings.  Ability to diagnose data discrepancies and maintain quality.  Strong communication skills and the ability to explain complex scenarios.  Ability to work in an Agile model  A strong attention to detail on documentation.  Good accounting/finance knowledge.  Finance or Accounting a distinct advantage, but not a show stopper.  Bonus points  A Degree in a Software/Data related discipline.  Experience of working with REST/SOAP web services  Experience of working with Financial Accounting Packages  Knowledge of data access mechanisms (ADO, ODBC, APIs).  Exposure to a SaaS product development environment would be well received.  This is a fantastic opportunity to join a growing company that has products that are being received with great enthusiasm by some respected names in the finance world. Good Package with Health, Dental and Vision.  We cannot sponsor or Engauge C2C for this role
